attributes.action: Aid wildfire’s in Turkey with aerial firefighting and medications for animals.
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government has the financial capability to aid Turkey. Helping Turkey means saving lives and that’s the most important reason why the UK Government should help Turkey.
attributes.background:
Turkey’s wildfires have reached uncontrollable stages due to the Turkish government not having enough planes and equipment to stop the fires.

We should provide planes to fight the fire and medications for the animals that have been injured.

We must save as many lives as we can!
Help Turkey!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
